'''Damaged Letter''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained through exploration in [["Scions of the Canopy"]]. This item is used in the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Lost Packages Retrieval]]''. Showing this item to [[NPC]] [[Michica]] changes it into [[Chanca's Letter]].
